item.title: icinga2 监控工具评测
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: 本来想写一个安装手册，可是安装完成之后发现其实非常简单，最后就把题目改为评测了。本文也不是全面的评测文章，关于它的能力和功能，待后续了解的深

item.title: Some old stuff for sharing
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: I think the following open source software resources could be helpful to you. 本页面上是我认为可能对您有用的资源连接，目的是让您能以最小的时间和精力代价来体验开源软件。使用一个虚拟应用可能是一

item.title: zenoss opennms comparison/比较
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: 在我做任何比较之前还是先看看Wiki上对一系列网管监控软件的比较，源网页地址在 http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Network_monitoring_comparison 上面一共列出了12中不同的开源软件，从13个方面以矩阵的方式

item.title: ISO open source software
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: There are some projects do have ISO file for downloading. That means you could run this solution with in 20 minutes on a physics machine or a vmware session. You can just download this ISO image file and burn it on a blank cd; then you will insert it into DVD/CD driver of your target machine, after press few enter keys; You finally got all software on this box. Reboot

item.title: Nagios华丽的外衣NagVis
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: 如果你用过Nagios的话，它的2D、3D Map一定会给你留下一些印象；2D Map的确能比较试用一点，不过看上去还是挺难看的。NagVis就

item.title: 翻译[opennms-discuss]邮件组里的一个讨论“Nagios转变”
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: 全文在＝》China OpenNMS ——————————————– 我们已经在一个中等规模的企业实施了Nagios，用来监控一堆Cisco设备：交换机、路由器、防火墙，还有各种类型的服
